titleStmt.title: The history of Great Britaine under the conquests of ye Romans, Saxons, Danes and Normans Their originals, manners, warres, coines & seales: with ye successions, lives, acts & issues of the English monarchs from Iulius Cæsar, to our most gracious soueraigne King Iames. by Iohn Speed.
titleStmt.author: Speed, John, 1552?-1629.
Schweitzer, Christoph, wood-engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: [by William Hall and John Beale] anno cum privilegio 1611 and are to be solde by Iohn Sudbury & Georg Humble, in Popes-head alley at ye signe of ye white Horse,

notesStmt.note: Printers' names from colophon preceding the second index.
The woodcuts are by Christoph Schweitzer.
The pagination is continued from "The theatre of the empire of Great Britaine" (STC 23041).
Includes indexes and a final errata leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Newberry Library.

place.placeName: Popes-head alley at ye signe of ye white Horse
